children.content:
Instructions

  • Select Store listing in the menu at the left and set the follow properties:
    • In the Categorization section:
      • Set the Application type to Applications
      • Set the Category to Books & Reference (or appropriate category)
    • In the Content details section:
      • Set Website
      • Set Email
    • In the Privacy Policy section:
      • Set Privacy Policy to the URL of the App Privacy Policy
      • For an example, see the Wycliffe Scripture App Privacy Policy
  • Select Content rating in the menu at the left and do the following:
    • Click CONTINUE to start the process of creating the content rating
    • Enter Email address and Confirm email address of the administrator of the app channel who will receive the content rating license.
    • Select app category REFERENCE, NEWS, OR EDUCATIONAL (or appropriate category)
    • Answer the questions
    • Click SAVE QUESTIONNAIRE
    • Click CALCULATE RATING
    • Review Rating Category values
    • If correct, click APPLY RATING
    • To make changes in the future, go back to Content rating and click START NEW QUESTIONNAIRE
  • Select Pricing & distribution in the menu at the left and set the follow properties:
    • In Countries, choose Available for the appropriate countries. To make the app available for all countries, select the radio button in the header.
    • Set Primarily Child-Directed to appropriate value
    • Set Contains ads to No, it has no ads
    • In the Consent section:
      • Check Content guidelines that your app meets Android Content Guidelines. Please review to ensure that you do.
      • Check US export laws
    • Click SAVE DRAFT
    • Click Ready to publish link
    • Click MANAGE RELEASES which will take you to App releases
  • In App releases do the following
    • Click EDIT RELEASE in Production section under the Production track and do the following:
      • Enter initial Release notes in What's new in this release?
      • Note: For subsequent releases, this information will be inserted automatically from the App Builder's Google Play Listing section from the What's New tab.
      • Click REVIEW
      • Click START ROLLOUT TO PRODUCTION
